data:
## function_createPagination
> **createPagination**(`props`?): [`PaginationWidget`](#paginationwidget)

Create a PaginationWidget with given config props

### Parameters

• **props?**: [`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`PaginationProps`](#paginationprops)\>

### Returns

[`PaginationWidget`](#paginationwidget)

a PaginationWidget

## interface_DirectionsHrefs
### Properties

#### next

> **next**: `string`

The href for the 'Next' direction link

***

#### previous

> **previous**: `string`

The href for the 'Previous' navigation link

## function_getPaginationDefaultConfig
> **getPaginationDefaultConfig**(): [`PaginationProps`](#paginationprops)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Pagination config

### Returns

[`PaginationProps`](#paginationprops)

the default Pagination config

## interface_PaginationApi
### Methods

#### first

> **first**(): `void`

To "go" to the first page

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### last

> **last**(): `void`

To "go" to the last page

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### next

> **next**(): `void`

To "go" to the next page

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### previous

> **previous**(): `void`

To "go" to the previous page

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### select

> **select**(`page`): `void`

To "go" to a specific page

##### Parameters

• **page**: `number`

The page number to select

##### Returns

`void`

## class_PaginationComponent
### Implements

- [`AfterContentChecked`](https://angular.dev/api/core/AfterContentChecked)

### Constructors

#### new PaginationComponent

> **new PaginationComponent**(): [`PaginationComponent`](#paginationcomponent)

##### Returns

[`PaginationComponent`](#paginationcomponent)

### Properties

#### _widget

> `readonly` **\_widget**: [`AngularWidget`](../types#angularwidget)\<[`PaginationWidget`](#paginationwidget)\>

***

#### activeLabel

> **activeLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the "active" page.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'(current)'
```

***

#### ariaEllipsisLabel

> **ariaEllipsisLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the "Ellipsis" page.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'Ellipsis page element'`

***

#### ariaFirstLabel

> **ariaFirstLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the "First" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'Action link for first page'
```

***

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the nav element.

for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'Page navigation'`

***

#### ariaLastLabel

> **ariaLastLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the "Last" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'Action link for last page'
```

***

#### ariaLiveLabel

> **ariaLiveLabel**: `undefined` \| (`currentPage`, `pageCount`) => `string`

Provide the label for the aria-live element
This is used for accessibility purposes.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Param

The current page number

##### Param

The total number of pages

##### Default Value

```ts
(currentPage: number) => `Current page is ${currentPage}`
```

***

#### ariaNextLabel

> **ariaNextLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the "Next" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'Action link for next page'
```

***

#### ariaPageLabel

> **ariaPageLabel**: `undefined` \| (`processPage`, `pageCount`) => `string`

Provide the label for each "Page" page button.
This is used for accessibility purposes.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Param

The current page number

##### Param

The total number of pages

##### Default Value

```ts
(processPage: number, pageCount: number) => `Page ${processPage} of ${pageCount}`
```

***

#### ariaPreviousLabel

> **ariaPreviousLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

The label for the "Previous" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'Action link for previous page'
```

***

#### boundaryLinks

> **boundaryLinks**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true`, the "First" and "Last" page links are shown.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### className

> **className**: `undefined` \| `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### collectionSize

> **collectionSize**: `undefined` \| `number`

The number of items in your paginated collection.

Note, that this is not the number of pages. Page numbers are calculated dynamically based on
`collectionSize` and `pageSize`.

Ex. if you have 100 items in your collection and displaying 20 items per page, you'll end up with 5 pages.

Whatever the collectionSize the page number is of minimum 1.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### directionLinks

> **directionLinks**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true`, the "Next" and "Previous" page links are shown.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true`, pagination links will be disabled.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ellipsisLabel

> **ellipsisLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the ellipsis slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'…'`

***

#### firstPageLabel

> **firstPageLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the first slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'«'`

***

#### lastPageLabel

> **lastPageLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the last slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'»'`

***

#### nextPageLabel

> **nextPageLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the next slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'›'`

***

#### numberLabel

> **numberLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationNumberContext`](#paginationnumbercontext)\>

The template to use for the number slot
override any configuration parameters provided for this
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration

##### Param

The current page number

##### Default Value

```ts
({displayedPage}: PaginationNumberContext) => `${displayedPage}`
```

***

#### page

> **page**: `undefined` \| `number`

The current page.

Page numbers start with `1`.

##### Default Value

`1`

***

#### pageChange

> **pageChange**: `EventEmitter`\<`number`\>

An event fired when the page is changed.

Event payload is the number of the newly selected page.

Page numbers start with `1`.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### pageLink

> **pageLink**: `undefined` \| (`pageNumber`) => `string`

Factory function providing the href for a "Page" page anchor,
based on the current page number

##### Param

The index to use in the link

##### Default Value

```ts
(_page: number) => PAGE_LINK_DEFAULT
```

***

#### pagesDisplay

> **pagesDisplay**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the pages slot
To use to customize the pages view
override any configuration parameters provided for this

***

#### pagesFactory

> **pagesFactory**: `undefined` \| (`page`, `pageCount`) => `number`[]

pagesFactory returns a function computing the array of pages to be displayed
as number (-1 are treated as ellipsis).
Use Page slot to customize the pages view and not this

##### Param

The current page number

##### Param

The total number of pages

##### Default Value

```ts
(_page: number, pageCount: number) => {
		const pages: number[] = [];
		for (let i = 1; i <= pageCount; i++) {
			pages.push(i);
		}
		return pages;
	}
```

***

#### pageSize

> **pageSize**: `undefined` \| `number`

The number of items per page.

##### Remarks

min value is 1

##### Default Value

`10`

***

#### previousPageLabel

> **previousPageLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the previous slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'‹'`

***

#### size

> **size**: `undefined` \| `null` \| `"sm"` \| `"lg"`

The pagination display size.

Bootstrap currently supports small and large sizes.

##### Default Value

`null`

***

#### slotEllipsisFromContent

> **slotEllipsisFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationEllipsisDirective`](#paginationellipsisdirective)

***

#### slotFirstFromContent

> **slotFirstFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationFirstDirective`](#paginationfirstdirective)

***

#### slotLastFromContent

> **slotLastFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationLastDirective`](#paginationlastdirective)

***

#### slotNextFromContent

> **slotNextFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationNextDirective`](#paginationnextdirective)

***

#### slotNumberLabelFromContent

> **slotNumberLabelFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationNumberDirective`](#paginationnumberdirective)

***

#### slotPagesFromContent

> **slotPagesFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationPagesDirective`](#paginationpagesdirective)

***

#### slotPreviousFromContent

> **slotPreviousFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationPreviousDirective`](#paginationpreviousdirective)

***

#### slotStructureFromContent

> **slotStructureFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`PaginationStructureDirective`](#paginationstructuredirective)

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the structure of the pagination component
The default structure uses [ellipsisLabel](#paginationprops-ellipsislabel), [firstPageLabel](#paginationprops-firstpagelabel),
[previousPageLabel](#paginationprops-previouspagelabel), [nextPageLabel](#paginationprops-nextpagelabel),
[lastPageLabel](#paginationprops-lastpagelabel), [pagesDisplay](#paginationprops-pagesdisplay),
[numberLabel](#paginationprops-numberlabel),

### Accessors

#### api

> `get` **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]

Retrieves the widget api

##### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

the widget api

***

#### directives

> `get` **directives**(): `W`\[`"directives"`\]

Retrieves the widget directives

##### Returns

`W`\[`"directives"`\]

the widget directives

***

#### state

> `get` **state**(): [`Signal`](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)\<[`WidgetState`](../types#widgetstate)\<`W`\>\>

Retrieves the widget state as an Angular Signal

##### Returns

[`Signal`](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)\<[`WidgetState`](../types#widgetstate)\<`W`\>\>

the widget state

### Methods

#### ngAfterContentChecked

> **ngAfterContentChecked**(): `void`

A callback method that is invoked immediately after the
default change detector has completed checking all of the directive's
content.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Implementation of

`AfterContentChecked.ngAfterContentChecked`

***

#### ngOnChanges

> **ngOnChanges**(`changes`): `void`

##### Parameters

• **changes**: `SimpleChanges`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Inherit Doc

***

#### ngOnInit

> **ngOnInit**(): `void`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Inherit Doc

## type alias_PaginationContext
> **PaginationContext**: [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<[`PaginationWidget`](#paginationwidget)\>

A type for the slot context of the pagination widget

## constant_paginationDefaultSlotPages
> `const` **paginationDefaultSlotPages**: [`ComponentTemplate`](../types#componenttemplate)\<`unknown`, `"pages"`, [`PaginationDefaultSlotsComponent`](#paginationdefaultslotscomponent)\>

The default slot for the pages

## constant_paginationDefaultSlotStructure
> `const` **paginationDefaultSlotStructure**: [`ComponentTemplate`](../types#componenttemplate)\<`unknown`, `"structure"`, [`PaginationDefaultSlotsComponent`](#paginationdefaultslotscomponent)\>

## interface_PaginationDirectives
### Properties

#### pageFirst

> **pageFirst**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

A directive to be applied on the first link

***

#### pageLast

> **pageLast**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

A directive to be applied on the Last link

***

#### pageLink

> **pageLink**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<`object`\>

A directive to be applied to each page link
This will handle the click, tabindex and aria attributes

##### Type declaration

###### page

> **page**: `number`

***

#### pageNext

> **pageNext**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

A directive to be applied on the next link

***

#### pagePrev

> **pagePrev**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

A directive to be applied on the previous link

## interface_PaginationProps
### Properties

#### activeLabel

> **activeLabel**: `string`

The label for the "active" page.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'(current)'
```

***

#### ariaEllipsisLabel

> **ariaEllipsisLabel**: `string`

The label for the "Ellipsis" page.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'Ellipsis page element'`

***

> **ariaFirstLabel**: `string`

The label for the "First" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'Action link for first page'
```

***

The label for the nav element.

for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

The label for the "Last" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

```ts
'Action link for last page'
```

***

Provide the label for the aria-live element
This is used for accessibility purposes.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration

• **currentPage**: `number`

The current page number

• **pageCount**: `number`

The total number of pages

`string`

```ts
(currentPage: number) => `Current page is ${currentPage}`
```

for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Parameters

The current page number

• **pageCount**: `number`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

> **collectionSize**: `number`

The number of items in your paginated collection.

Note, that this is not the number of pages. Page numbers are calculated dynamically based on
`collectionSize` and `pageSize`.

Ex. if you have 100 items in your collection and displaying 20 items per page, you'll end up with 5 pages.

Whatever the collectionSize the page number is of minimum 1.

##### Default Value

***

#### directionLinks

> **directionLinks**: `boolean`

If `true`, the "Next" and "Previous" page links are shown.

##### Default Value

`true`

#### disabled

#### onPageChange

> **onPageChange**: (`page`) => `void`

An event fired when the page is changed.

Event payload is the number of the newly selected page.

Page numbers start with `1`.

##### Parameters

• **page**: `number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### page

> **page**: `number`

The current page.

Page numbers start with `1`.

##### Default Value

`1`

***

#### pageLink

Factory function providing the href for a "Page" page anchor,
based on the current page number

##### Parameters

• **pageNumber**: `number`

The index to use in the link

##### Returns

`string`

##### Default Value

```ts
(_page: number) => PAGE_LINK_DEFAULT
```

***

#### pagesDisplay

> **pagesDisplay**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the pages slot
To use to customize the pages view
override any configuration parameters provided for this

***

#### pagesFactory

> **pagesFactory**: (`page`, `pageCount`) => `number`[]

pagesFactory returns a function computing the array of pages to be displayed
as number (-1 are treated as ellipsis).
Use Page slot to customize the pages view and not this

##### Parameters

• **page**: `number`

The current page number

• **pageCount**: `number`

The total number of pages

##### Returns

`number`[]

##### Default Value

```ts
(_page: number, pageCount: number) => {
		const pages: number[] = [];
		for (let i = 1; i <= pageCount; i++) {
			pages.push(i);
		}
		return pages;
	}
```

***

#### pageSize

> **pageSize**: `number`

The number of items per page.

##### Remarks

min value is 1

##### Default Value

`10`

***

The template to use for the previous slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

#### size

> **size**: `null` \| `"sm"` \| `"lg"`

The pagination display size.

Bootstrap currently supports small and large sizes.

##### Default Value

`null`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the structure of the pagination component
The default structure uses [ellipsisLabel](#paginationprops-ellipsislabel), [firstPageLabel](#paginationprops-firstpagelabel),
[previousPageLabel](#paginationprops-previouspagelabel), [nextPageLabel](#paginationprops-nextpagelabel),
[lastPageLabel](#paginationprops-lastpagelabel), [pagesDisplay](#paginationprops-pagesdisplay),
[numberLabel](#paginationprops-numberlabel),

## interface_PaginationState
### Properties

#### activeLabel

> **activeLabel**: `string`

The label for the "active" page.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'(current)'
```

***

#### ariaEllipsisLabel

> **ariaEllipsisLabel**: `string`

The label for the "Ellipsis" page.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'Ellipsis page element'`

***

#### ariaFirstLabel

> **ariaFirstLabel**: `string`

The label for the "First" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

```ts
'Action link for first page'
```

***

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

The label for the nav element.

for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'Page navigation'`

***

The label for the "Last" page button.
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

***

The aria-live text

override any configuration parameters provided for this


***

#### boundaryLinks

> **boundaryLinks**: `boolean`

If `true`, the "First" and "Last" page links are shown.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### directionLinks

> **directionLinks**: `boolean`

If `true`, the "Next" and "Previous" page links are shown.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### directionsHrefs

> **directionsHrefs**: [`DirectionsHrefs`](#directionshrefs)

The hrefs for the direction links

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `boolean`

If `true`, pagination links will be disabled.

##### Default Value

`false`

#### nextDisabled

true if the next link need to be disabled

***

#### numberLabel

> **numberLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationNumberContext`](#paginationnumbercontext)\>

The template to use for the number slot
override any configuration parameters provided for this
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration

##### Param

The current page number

##### Default Value

```ts
({displayedPage}: PaginationNumberContext) => `${displayedPage}`
```

***

#### page

> **page**: `number`

The current page.

Page numbers start with `1`.

##### Default Value

`1`

***

#### pageCount

> **pageCount**: `number`

The number of pages.

***

#### pages

> **pages**: `number`[]

The current pages, the number in the Array is the number of the page.

***

#### pagesDisplay

> **pagesDisplay**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the pages slot
To use to customize the pages view
override any configuration parameters provided for this

***

#### pagesHrefs

> **pagesHrefs**: `string`[]

The hrefs for each "Page" page link

***

#### pagesLabel

> **pagesLabel**: `string`[]

The label for each "Page" page link.

***

#### previousDisabled

> **previousDisabled**: `boolean`

true if the previous link need to be disabled

***

#### previousPageLabel

> **previousPageLabel**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`PaginationContext`](#paginationcontext)\>

The template to use for the previous slot
for I18n, we suggest to use the global configuration
override any configuration parameters provided for this

##### Default Value

`'‹'`

***

#### size

> **size**: `null` \| `"sm"` \| `"lg"`

The pagination display size.

Bootstrap currently supports small and large sizes.

##### Default Value

`null`

The default structure uses [ellipsisLabel](#paginationprops-ellipsislabel), [firstPageLabel](#paginationprops-firstpagelabel),
[previousPageLabel](#paginationprops-previouspagelabel), [nextPageLabel](#paginationprops-nextpagelabel),
[lastPageLabel](#paginationprops-lastpagelabel), [pagesDisplay](#paginationprops-pagesdisplay),
[numberLabel](#paginationprops-numberlabel),
